title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart. Steps to reproduce: 1.
EB: In the properties file, when the localization key is left blank but it has a valid value, the text should still be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Find the localization key that is supposed to be externalized in the chart title.
3. Leave the value of the key blank.
4. Save the file.
5. Display the chart and observe if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
